chapters.title: Chapter 10:  A Plan Succeeds
chapters.info: Faolain Orande, p. 237 (266)—Dark, curly-haired Aes Sedai of the Blue Ajah. She had an extreme dislike for Wilders, and did not treat Siuan and Leane very well when they were stilled, either. She spent eight years as a novice, and five among the Accepted. She was among the four raised to full sisterhood by Egwene. She is still treated as an Accepted by most of the sisters. See also Dabei, Theodrin.
